main event: A bright light was observed in the sky moving slowly from east to west. After about 1 minute, the object changed course and moved rapidly to the south.
interesting points: The object appeared to have the size of a small jet fighter aircraft and was not accompanied by any other objects.
The object was observed for approximately 1 minute before disappearing.
The sighting was reported to the Base Operations Center at Buckley Air Force Base near Denver, Colorado.
An Air Force officer observed the UFO in the sky northeast of Buckley AFB, Colorado at approximately 2200 hours on July 29, 1964.
The UFO appeared to be larger than a star and brighter than any other object in the sky at the time, but no sound was heard associated with it.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
